    public unsafe struct <#CALLER:TYPE_NAME#>_FA<TComponent> : IFastAccess
        where TComponent : unmanaged, IComponent<#GENERIC_CONSTRAINTS:TComponent#>
    {
        private <#CALLER:DECLARE#> _caller;

        [MethodImpl(MethodImplOptions.AggressiveInlining)]
        void IFastAccess.Config(ICaller caller)
        {
            _caller = (<#CALLER:DECLARE#>)caller;
        }

        [MethodImpl(MethodImplOptions.AggressiveInlining)]
        public TComponent Create()
            => _caller.Create();

        [MethodImpl(MethodImplOptions.AggressiveInlining)]
        public Type GetElementType()
            => _caller.GetElementType();

        public uint GetCount()
            => _caller.GetCount();

        public bool IsHas(<#IF MULTI#>EntityId id<#END#>)
            => _caller.IsHas(<#IF MULTI#>id<#END#>);

        public void Add(<#IF MULTI#>EntityId id, <#END#>ref TComponent data)
        {
            _caller.Add(<#IF MULTI#>id, <#END#>ref data);
        }

        [MethodImpl(MethodImplOptions.AggressiveInlining)]
        public ref TComponent Add(<#IF MULTI#>EntityId id<#END#>)
            => ref _caller.Add(<#IF MULTI#>id<#END#>);

        {
            _caller.Add(<#IF MULTI#>id<#END#>);
        }

        {
            _caller.Remove(<#IF MULTI#>id<#END#>);

            => ref _caller.Read(<#IF MULTI#>id<#END#>);

            => ref _caller.Get(<#IF MULTI#>id<#END#>);
